data.title: Ripple CEO Says Bitcoin Can Hit $180,000 By End Of 2026
data.description: Ripple (CRYPTO: XRP) CEO Brad Garlinghouse argues the bearish mood around Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) is temporary and completely out of sync with the structural tailwinds supporting the market. What Happened: Speaking at Binance Blockchain Week 2025, ...
data.keywords: Brad Garlinghouse, Ripple, Jeff Bezos, digital assets, Franklin Templeton, retirement accounts
